TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoggerDescription extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains information about a logger as a collection of values that can be used to instantiate the logger as well as being serialized to pass between different processes.

MemberSignature.Value: public LoggerDescription (string loggerClassName, string loggerAssemblyName, string loggerAssemblyFile, string loggerSwitchParameters, Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity verbosity);

public: LoggerDescription(System::String ^ loggerClassName, System::String ^ loggerAssemblyName, System::String ^ loggerAssemblyFile, System::String ^ loggerSwitchParameters, Microsoft::Build::Framework::LoggerVerbosity verbosity);
new Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.LoggerDescription : string * string * string * string * Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity -> Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.LoggerDescription

Docs.param: The class name for the logger.
The assembly name for the logger.
The assembly file name for the logger.
A string of logger parameters, if there are none.

The verbosity switch for the logger.
**Note** On the command line, all loggers get the same verbosity level.
Docs.summary: Creates a logger description based on the given parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The logger name is generated by combining its class name and assembly name.

Docs.summary: Gets the string of logger parameters.
Docs.value: A string list of the log parameters, or if there are none.
